text: alahi ke’irisu bek’eri lela amilaki yelemi፡፡ hiyawi rasuni chayi newi፡፡ manigelajetimi inik’ilifimi atiyizewimi፡፡ besemayati wisit’ina bemidiri wisit’i yalewi hulu yerisu bicha newi፡፡ ya irisu zenidi befek’adu bihoni iniji yemiyamalidi manewi? (kefit’urochi) befitachewi yalewinina kehwalachewi yalewini hulu yawik’ali፡፡ beshawimi negeri iniji ke‘iwik’etu beminimi negeri ayakabibumi (ayawik’umi)፡፡ meniberu semayatinina midirini sefa፡፡ t’ibek’achewimi ayak’itewimi፡፡ irisumi yehulu belayi talak’i newi፡፡
